name: La Mano Loca (Sticky Hand)
description:
Dr. Balzerian’s failed experiment has made one of his hands sticky! Security robots in his own laboratory do not recognise him and want to kill him! Will he be able to escape from his lab? 

Created by Team Glitch Happens (our game jam team): 

  • Daniel Gomez (@koocachookies): Art
  • Sergio Martinez (@anidealgift): Code
  • Pedro Fuentes (@__pedrofuentes): Design

Originally created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare #34. Theme Tied: Two Button Controls, Growing
